REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sSQL1 AS String,sSQL2 AS String Dim vSQLArray AS Variant
Sub Formular_init() reset_Summen() init_Form_Document() init_Form_Kundendaten() init_Form_Steuerung() init_List_Filter_Jahr() init_List_Filter_Monat() init_List_Filter_Status() init_List_Filter_Kunde() init_List_Filter_Projekte() init_List_Documentauswahl() init_List_Monat() init_List_Kalenderjahr() End Sub
Sub init_Form_Document() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM "& sTabelle &" WHERE DocumentID=:c" oForm_Document.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Document.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Document.CommandType=2 oForm_Document.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Document.Cycle=1 oForm_Document.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Steuerung() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM Steuerung WHERE ClientID="& iClientID oForm_Steuerung.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Steuerung.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Steuerung.CommandType=2 oForm_Steuerung.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Steuerung.Cycle=1 oForm_Steuerung.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Kundendaten() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM "& sKunden &" WHERE KontaktID=:a" oForm_Kundendaten.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Kundendaten.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Kundendaten.CommandType=2 oForm_Kundendaten.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Kundendaten.Cycle=1 oForm_Kundendaten.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_List_Documentauswahl() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(t1.DocumentID,': ',t3.Name1,' --> ',t1.Document_Name) AS Name,t1.DocumentID"&_ " FROM ("& sTabelle &" AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN "& sKunden &" AS t3"&_ " ON t3.KontaktID=t1.KontaktID)"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE ((((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr AND LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " OR (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Jahr)=0)))"&_ " AND ((MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Monat AND LENGTH(t2.Monat) > 0)"&_ " OR (MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Monat) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Monat)=0)))"&_ " AND ((t1.Status=t2.Status AND LENGTH(t2.Status) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.Status LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Status) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Status)=0)))"&_ " AND ((t1.Document_Name LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%') AND LENGTH(t2.Suchstring) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.Document_Name LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Suchstring) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Suchstring)=0)))"&_ " AND ((t1.KontaktID=t2.KundenID AND LENGTH(t2.KundenID) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.KontaktID LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.KundenID) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.KundenID)=0))))"&_ " AND ((t1.ProjektID=t2.ProjektID AND LENGTH(t2.ProjektID) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.ProjektID like '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.ProjektID) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.ProjektID)=0)))"&_ " OR t1.DocumentID=t2.DocumentID)"&_ " ORDER BY t1.DocumentID DESC") oList_Documentauswahl.ListSourceType=4 oList_Documentauswahl.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Jahr() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(Erstellungsdatum),YEAR(Erstellungsdatum) AS Jahr"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle &" ORDER BY Jahr DESC") oList_Filter_Jahr.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Jahr.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Monat() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT t1.Monat,t1.MonatID"&_ " FROM (Monate AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN "& sTabelle &" AS t2"&_ " ON t1.MonatID = MONTH(t2.Erstellungsdatum))"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t3"&_ " ON t3.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE (((YEAR(t2.Erstellungsdatum)=t3.Jahr AND LENGTH(t3.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " OR (YEAR(t2.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t3.Jahr) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t3.Jahr)=0)))"&_ " OR t1.MonatID=t3.Monat)"&_ " ORDER BY t1.MonatID+0 ASC") oList_Filter_Monat.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Monat.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Status() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT t1.Status,t1.Status AS Stat"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle &" AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE (((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr AND LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " OR (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Jahr)=0)))"&_ " AND ((MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Monat AND LENGTH(t2.Monat) > 0)"&_ " OR (MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Monat) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Monat)=0)))"&_ " OR t1.Status=t2.Status)"&_ " UNION"&_ " SELECT DISTINCT t2.Status,t2.Status AS Stat"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle &" AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE t2.Status<>t1.Status") oList_Filter_Status.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Status.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Kunde() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT "&_ "CONCAT(t3.Name1,' ',t3.Vorname,' ',t3.Name2,' --> ',t3.Ort) AS Name,t1.KontaktID"&_ " FROM ("& sTabelle &" AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN "& sKunden &" AS t3"&_ " ON t3.KontaktID=t1.KontaktID)"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE (((YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Jahr AND LENGTH(t2.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " OR (YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Jahr) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Jahr)=0)))"&_ " AND ((MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum)=t2.Monat AND LENGTH(t2.Monat) > 0)"&_ " OR (MONTH(t1.Erstellungsdatum) LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Monat) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Monat)=0)))"&_ " AND ((t1.Status=t2.Status AND LENGTH(t2.Status) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.Status LIKE '%' AND (LENGTH(t2.Status) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t2.Status)=0)))"&_ " OR t1.KontaktID=t2.KundenID)"&_ " ORDER BY t3.Name1 ASC") oList_Filter_Kunde.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Kunde.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Filter_Projekte() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT distinct t1.Projekt_Name,t1.ProjektID "&_ " FROM "& sProjekte &" as t1"&_ " INNER JOIN "& sTabelle &" as t2"&_ " ON t1.ProjektID=t2.ProjektID"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung as t3"&_ " ON t3.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE ((((YEAR(t2.Erstellungsdatum)=t3.Jahr AND LENGTH(t3.Jahr) > 0)"&_ " OR t1.ProjektID like '%' AND (LENGTH(t3.Jahr) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t3.Jahr)=0)))"&_ " AND ((t2.KontaktID=t3.KundenID AND LENGTH(t3.KundenID) > 0)"&_ " OR (t1.ProjektID like '%' AND (LENGTH(t3.KundenID) IS NULL OR LENGTH(t3.KundenID)=0)))"&_ " OR t1.ProjektID=t3.ProjektID)"&_ " ORDER BY t1.Projekt_Name ASC") oList_Filter_Projekte.ListSourceType=4 oList_Filter_Projekte.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Kalenderjahr() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum),YEAR(t1.Erstellungsdatum) AS Jahr"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle &" AS t1 ORDER BY Jahr DESC") oList_Kalenderjahr.ListSourceType=4 oList_Kalenderjahr.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_List_Monat() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT Monat,MonatID FROM Monate ORDER BY MonatID+0") oList_Monat.ListSourceType=4 oList_Monat.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
